entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 06:16 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
